commit message:
* Added android support library v4
* Updated android targetSdk to 17
* Started reworking interface to use viewpager and fragments.
* Created AutoRepeatImageButton
* Created new landscape layout for navigation fragment
* Fixed autorepeat buttons not drawing pressed state.
* Fixed handling of orientation change.
* Fixed autorepeat buttons performing click when motion event is cancel.
* Removed MythCom singleton no paramter getter
* Updated screenshot images
* Deleted old screenshots

* Moved KeyBindingManager settings to public static members for easy access.
* Stopped listening for tab changes
* Moved KeyBindingManager to AbstractMythmoteFragment
* Moved running status change on UI thread to Mythmote's status change handler.
* Added setting jump button text to friendly name. Working towards jump buttons having user definable text.

* Created quickjump fragment
* Created keyboard input fragment.
* Added jump button text setting.

* Added ability to edit button friendly name.
* Cleaned up a few things

* Implemented large screen layout
* Added quickjump landscape layout.
* Deleted old layouts

* Updated button margins to be more uniform across all layouts and screen sizes.
* Fixed numberpad column sizes for older devices.
* Removed old MythMote class memebers and function.
* Moved setting up UI to OnResume(). On occasion when turning screen on buttons would not be functional until after an orientation change.

* Created connection timeout preference and increased default from 2sec to 5sec.
* Commented out gesture preferences.
* Updated manifest to version 1.8.0 code 1708
* Added drawables from android sdk
* Moved keyboard input to a dialog.
* Added pinging frontend before connection. Reduced failed connections. Connections that would fail are still slow to establish.
* Updated to version 1.8.1 code 1808

* Added delete button to keyboard input layout
* Fixed keyboard input fragment.
* Added new tablet screen shots
* Resized screenshots to meet google play requirements
* Creating tag for mythmote 1.8.0
